description: includes both liquid and solid phases
name: pr

description: surface solar irradiance for UV calculations
name: rsds

description: near-surface (usually, 10 meters) eastward component of wind.
name: uas

description: the mass of water in all phases in a thin surface soil layer.
name: mrsos

description: "skin" temperature of all surfaces except open ocean.
name: tslsi

description: temperature of surface of open ocean, sampled synoptically.
name: tos

description: at surface; includes both liquid and solid phases.
name: prc

description: at surface; includes precipitation of all forms of water in the solid phase
name: prsn

description: "the total runoff (including ""drainage"" through the base of the soil model) leaving the land portion of the grid cell."
name: mrro

description: surface solar irradiance clear sky for UV calculations
name: rsdscs

description: surface pressure (not mean sea-level pressure), 2-D field to calculate the 3-D pressure field from hybrid coordinates
name: ps
